mapper.sql: ID, OddsID, UpOdds, Goal, DownOdds, ModifyTime, isEarly
mapper.select: select o.OddsID,ol.* from totalscore o left join totalscoredetail ol on o.OddsID = ol.OddsID where o.ScheduleID = #{mid} and o.CompanyID = #{cpy} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into totalscoredetail (ID, OddsID, UpOdds, Goal, DownOdds, ModifyTime, isEarly) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT})

insert into totalscoredetail
ID,
OddsID,
UpOdds,
Goal,
DownOdds,
ModifyTime,
isEarly,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{upodds,jdbcType=REAL},
#{goal,jdbcType=REAL},
#{downodds,jdbcType=REAL},
#{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{isearly,jdbcType=BIT},
mapper.update:
update totalscoredetail
OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL},
Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL},
DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL},
ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
isEarly = #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update totalscoredetail set OddsID = #{oddsid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UpOdds = #{upodds,jdbcType=REAL}, Goal = #{goal,jdbcType=REAL}, DownOdds = #{downodds,jdbcType=REAL}, ModifyTime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isEarly = #{isearly,jdbcType=BIT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
